cab.content: SECRET.Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.From Viceroy, 14th May 1917.Secret. Weekly Report. North-West Frontier quiet except for Mahsud unrest. Reported gathering of Swatis to turn Nawab of Dir out of Lower Swat. Combataut recruiting for April. Totals 10,372. No change in general military situation in India or Afghanistan.v
